Sentencas: A novel route was developed to fabricate anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with a high throughput and low manufacturing costs.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In contrast to classical manufacturing routes, this novel route starts with the tape casting of the thin electrolyte followed by the tape casting of the anode and anode support.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: All three layers were cast green-on-green and finally sintered to yield a gas-tight electrolyte.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By carefully selecting the raw materials for all three layers, it is possible to manufacture near-net-shape half-cells.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The half-cells were characterized with respect to thickness, microstructure, bending behavior, electrolyte gas leakage, shrinkage, electrolyte residual stresses, and mechanical strength.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Finally, the cathode was screen-printed and fired, and the full cell characteristics were obtained in single-cell and stack tests.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Additionally, a scale-up to cell sizes of 200x200mm(2) was verified.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrolyte and anode thickness were around 20m, and the support was cast to 300-500m. The helium leak rates were better than the necessary internal threshold, and the characteristic bending strength obtained was in the range of 150-200MPa.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The single-cell tests revealed current densities of 1.0Acm(-2) at 700mV and 800 degrees C (H-2/air).
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A first stack test proved their stackability and operational functionality.
Titulo: Sequential Tape Casting of Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
